PageInfo.Message:
"<COL ffdc78>Dacreim Fortress Recapture
Battle</COL>"
is a War Mission where you form a party of up to
8 people to recapture a fortress that has been
occupied by the evil dragon army.
Destroy the flags indicating the 5 enemy camps
and defeat the leaders in those areas to recapture
the enemy camp.
Once the enemy camp is recaptured, our flag will
be placed in that location.
